TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: WCF(Windows Communication Foundation) 서비스에 적용되어 이 서비스를 ASP.NET 호환 코드로 실행할 수 있는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 서비스 구현 클래스에 적용된 경우 이 특성은 해당 서비스가 호스팅 AppDomain(응용 프로그램 도메인)에 사용될 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환 모드를 필요로 하는지 또는 지원하는지를 나타냅니다.When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스를 호스팅하는 AppDomains는 두 가지 호스팅 모드로 실행될 수 있습니다.AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes: - 혼합 전송 모드(기본값): 이 모드에서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스는 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 파이프라인에 참여하지 않습니다.Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. 따라서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스가 호스팅 환경 및 전송과 독립적으로 일관성 있게 작동할 수 있습니다.This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환 모드: 이 모드에서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스는 ASMX 서비스와 유사한 방식으로 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 파이프라인에 참여합니다. Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. 이 모드로 실행되는 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 서비스에는 파일 권한 부여, URL 권한 부여, HTTP 세션 상태 등과 같은 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 기능을 적용할 수 있습니다.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode. 호스팅 모드는 응용 프로그램 수준의 구성 플래그 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`를 통해 제어됩니다.The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` 이 플래그는 기본적으로 `false`이므로 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 호환 모드를 명시적으로 선택하지 않는 한 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 서비스는 혼합 전송 모드로 실행됩니다.This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. ASP.NET 호환 모드에 대 한 자세한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)합니다.For more informaiton about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 이렇게 하려면 속성을 사용합니다.Use the property to do this. 런타임에 응용 프로그램은 static 속성 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]의 값을 확인하여 호환 모드가 사용되는지를 감지할 수 있습니다.At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples 서비스 개발자가 설정 하 여 해당 서비스는 ASP.NET 호환 모드에만 실행 되도록 할 수는 속성에는 를 다음 예제와 같이Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: 서비스에 필요한 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환성 수준을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.
The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 호스팅 모드를 코드에 설정하려면 속성을 사용합니다.Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. 응용 프로그램 수준의 구성 플래그 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`를 설정하여 이 작업을 수행할 수도 있습니다.This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. 자세한 내용은 참조 [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)합니다.For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 런타임에 응용 프로그램은 static 속성 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]의 값을 확인하여 호환 모드가 사용되는지 여부를 감지할 수 있습니다.At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

exception.span: 이 값이 에 유효한 값이 아닌 경우

span.span: The value is not a valid one for the .

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription description, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase, class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> endpoints, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection parameters) cil managed

virtual void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceDescription ^ description, System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^ serviceHostBase, System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceEndpoint ^> ^ endpoints, System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingParameterCollection ^ parameters) = System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior::AddBindingParameters;

span.span: The used to host the service.

param.name: endpoints
param.span: 서비스에 대한 끝점을 포함하는 형식의 입니다.

span.span: The of type that contains the endpoints for the service.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 서비스의 바인딩 요소에서 액세스할 수 있는 매개 변수를 포함하는 입니다.

span.span: The that contains the parameters that the binding elements for the service can access.

summary.span: 바인딩 요소에서 계약 구현을 지원하기 위해 액세스할 수 있는 사용자 지정 데이터를 추가합니다.

span.span: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 호스팅 유형이 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환성 요구 사항과 일치하는지 확인합니다.

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
